# Government Tender Announcement - Request for Proposal for Autoclaves

## Overview
The Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the supply and delivery of three (3) single door, free standing steam sterilizers (autoclaves) to the Saskatoon Research and Development Center in Saskatchewan. This is a competitive procurement strategy that combines mandatory requirements and cost.

## Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement:

*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

## Tendering Procedures
This RFP is reserved for holders of Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI for the purchase of laboratory and scientific equipment, parts, and accessories, services, and supplies. Only suppliers currently pre-qualified on this arrangement have been invited to bid.

## Mandatory Technical Criteria
The responsive bidder must meet the following mandatory technical criteria:

*   Be a holder of Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI for the supply of laboratory and scientific equipment, parts, and accessories, services, and supplies with Public Works and Government Services Canada.
*   Provide three (3) single door, free standing steam sterilizers (autoclaves) that meet the requirements specified in the Solicitation Documents.
*   Have the lowest aggregate price.

## Contract Information

*   **Contracting Entity Name**: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
*   **Contracting Entity Address**: 400-303 Main Street, Winnipeg, Manitoba R3C3G7 Canada
*   **Contact Information**: Camille Sobczak, (204) 430-5426, camille.sobczak@agr.gc.ca
*   **Notice URL**: None

## Tender Closing Date
The tender closing date is November 27, 2024 at 5:00 PM.

Please refer to the solicitation documents for further details and instructions on how to submit a bid. Local and foreign suppliers are invited to participate in the procurement process.

**Get your copy of the solicitation documents on CanadaBuys (SAP Ariba)**
